content.raw:
i see...

To clarify, it is a segmentation fault, not an exception:

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffd22e4700 (LWP 29939)]
use_count (this=0x7fffcd3bd28f) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/shared_count.hpp:554
554	        return pi_ != 0? pi_->use_count(): 0;

    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/enable_shared_from_this.hpp:66

    _worldName=..., _parentName=..., _parentId=_parentId@entry=94) at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:240
```

looks like 108 does not fix all of the problems I thought it did. Will investigate.
